content: KWIK-Con+ Torx hex head screw anchor Versatile, high-performance screw anchor for concrete and masonry (carbon steel, hex head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easier and quicker installation with just one tool Torx® hex head with integrated washer for more secure driving and no bit slippage Durable design minimizes risk of head snaps Also available in stainless steel or with Torx® or Phillips flat head for countersinking applications Matched-tolerance carbide-tipped drill bits required when installing these screw anchors Applications Fastening in concrete, block, brick, and masonry Fitting window and door frames Installing electrical wall fixtures Installing handrails ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: Hex head Approvals / Test reports: Miami Dade County Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | Hex head | Approvals / Test reports | Miami Dade County | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU), Masonry (solid) | Reusable (and removable) | Not Possible | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | No | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | Material composition | Steel, zinc-plated (min. 8 µm) ### ITEMS- 2260085 -
